definition: place in Hubei, the starting point for a major rebellion at the end of Western Han/also pr. [Lu:4 lin2]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
true hero of Greenwood (refers to popular hero in Robin Hood style)
bold hero of Greenwood (refers to popular hero in Robin Hood style)

sentences.english: And the fourth one is currently called Into the Wild Green Yonder.
sentences.chinese: 第四部电影的名字暂定为《荒野绿林的彼端》。

sentences.english: Sunlight Rock and western-style houses hidden in the lush greenery on Gulangyu Islet, a tiny island off the coast of Xiamen, were faintly visible.
sentences.chinese: 阳光下的鼓浪屿，日光岩和绿林掩映的洋房依稀可见。

sentences.english: Desert edge Crossing this last green forest, it will be desert.
sentences.chinese: 《沙漠边缘》穿过这最后的绿林，就是沙漠。

sentences.english: They said they would rather be outlaws a year in Sherwood Forest.
sentences.chinese: 他们说宁可在谢伍德森林里当一年绿林好汉。

sentences.english: But a steam locomotive is a Shandong warrior.
sentences.chinese: 而蒸汽机车却是山东绿林中的武士”。

sentences.english: The performance of the Greenwood Boys at the Workers' Club was all right.
sentences.chinese: 绿林少年“演唱团在工人俱乐部的那场演出还不错。

sentences.english: During his year in the forest, Robin met many other outlaws.
sentences.chinese: 在森林里的一年，罗宾遇见其他许多绿林大盗。

sentences.english: Who will be meeting Greenwood Boys at the station ?
sentences.chinese: 哪些人将在车站迎接“绿林少年”？

sentences.english: The Greenwood Boys will be staying for five days.
And at last Joe, representing a whole tribe of weeping outlaws.
sentences.chinese: 最后乔扮演了一伙绿林好汉，哭哭啼啼。

definition: true hero of Greenwood (refers to popular hero in Robin Hood style)
to break into a house for robbery (idiom)
a rank growth of grass/uncultivated land/wilderness
